Name: childhood acute lymphocytic leukemia
Definition: An acute lymphocytic leukemia occuring during childhood.

Name: adult acute lymphocytic leukemia
Definition: A lymphoblastic leukemia that has_material_basis_in immature malignant lymphocytes (lymphoblasts) committed to the B-cell or T-cell lineage and located in bone marrow and located in peripheral blood.

Name: B- and T-cell mixed leukemia
Definition: A lymphoblastic leukemia that is characterized by over production of lymphoblasts.

Name: null-cell leukemia
Definition: A lymphoblastic leukemia that is characterized by over production of lymphoblasts.
